EmailTemplate.name: TMS Ticket Closed Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Ticket {!TMS_Ticket_Information__c.Name} has been Closed
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!TMS_Ticket_Information__c.OwnerFullName},
This mail is to inform you that the below ticket has been resolved and closed.
{!TMS_Ticket_Information__c.Link}Open the link using Google Chrome
Ticket #DetailsResolution DetailsPerson Assigned {!TMS_Ticket_Information__c.Name} {!TMS_Ticket_Information__c.Issue_Detail__c} {!TMS_Ticket_Information__c.Resolution_Detail__c} {!TMS_Ticket_Information__c.Case_Assigned_To__c}
Many thanks, TMS Ticketing Team
